update YOU_PUNISH_TYPE
YCT_COMPLAIN_TYPE = #{yctComplainType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
YPT_INTEGRAL = #{yptIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER},
YPT_STOP_DAYS = #{yptStopDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
YPT_DESC = #{yptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where YPT_ID = #{yptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update YOU_PUNISH_TYPE set YCT_COMPLAIN_TYPE = #{yctComplainType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YPT_INTEGRAL = #{yptIntegral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YPT_STOP_DAYS = #{yptStopDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YPT_DESC = #{yptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, YPT_COMPLAINT_NUMBER = #{yptComplaintNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, YPT_STOP_OBJECT = #{yptStopObject,jdbcType=TINYINT}, YPT_RETURN_OBJECT = #{yptReturnObject,jdbcType=TINYINT}, YPT_SHARE_FLAG = #{yptShareFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT} where YPT_ID = #{yptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM YOU_PUNISH_TYPE WHERE DEL_FLAG=0
AND YCT_COMPLAIN_TYPE in (SELECT YCT_ID FROM YOU_COMPLAINT_TYPE WHERE DEL_FLAG=0 AND YCT_OWNER = #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY YCT_ID)
ORDER BY YCT_COMPLAIN_TYPE ASC
